name: The grand harvest championship (I must win)
name_original: The grand harvest championship (I must win)
description:
It is time for the yearly Grand Harvest Championship.

This year, I must win! It’s my year, I can feel it.

I will have to defeat 5 other contestants in a card game of magical crops, set on a 4x4 grid of tiles.

When a crop grows, it will transform into a magical (and valuable) being. The contestant with the most valuable crops at the end wins the match.

Some crops need to be planted on wet soil, I might have to splash the tiles with water before playing my cards. But if I’m not careful, I might make it easier for my opponent as well.

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 52
